website_summaries.verdict: An excellent portable unit by a top brand in kitchen products.
pros: Dual burners, automatic shutoff, built in timer
Good enough to be a solid backup for large stove top or provide additional burners
cons: Expensive, eight heat settings on one burner, five on the other -- not as much variation as competing units

customer_reviews.title: but I'm very disappointed that I can't use them both together
customer_reviews.text: The second burner on this cooktop failed within about 3 months of receiving it. The warranty required me to pay for shipping to get it replaced by Cuisinart, which was over $60. The replacement cooktop has started giving the same error as the original when using both burners at the same time (the second burner turns off and displays an error code). Right now I'm using only one burner at a time and it seems to be OK, but I'm very disappointed that I can't use them both together. Otherwise I'm a huge fan of induction ranges--they're fast to heat up and don't create a lot of waste heat.
customer_reviews.author: SuperLuckyCat

customer_reviews.title: Great for rv...
customer_reviews.text: Great product..we set this down into new counter top in our rv to replace gas stove..works perfect!!..heats fast...love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher pipes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long. within a year several heat cracks ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't last long. within a year several heat cracks developed in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Timer wont work
customer_reviews.text: Timer doesn't work.. If you set the timer, it won't shut off by itself. You have to manually shut it off. Other than that, everything is fine
customer_reviews.author: Seong

customer_reviews.title: New to me, and I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Just cooking for one or two and found that two burners is totally adequate. Water boils quickly, foods cook quickly and rarely clump together. I'm new to induction cooking but think it is really right for me. (And you have to buy a new set of pots and frying pans if you don't have induction-compatible cookware already....I cleaned out my cabinet shelves and made a lot of other people happy to have "new" (to them) pans also!)
customer_reviews.author: Margaret S. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Weak, Weak, and  Awful
customer_reviews.text: I bout two induction surfaces, I bout Cuisinart because they had a phone number, but it did't help. The product just barely works as compared to the other surface I bout.
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: One burner stopped working within months!
customer_reviews.text: The larger burner stopped working within months of owning. No apparent reason, just stopped turning on. Until this, it was great and we were loving it. Can’t get through to Cuisinart to figure it out, but according to the manual we will have to pay both shipping and handling to send back and receive a new cooktop. Overall I can’t recommend something that just stops working for no reason, then costs you to replace. In the end, this burner would cost us closer to $200+ to get a second “fixed” one, so just nite the bullet and get a nicer one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Campers

customer_reviews.title: You Won't Regret This Purchase 😊
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the 2 burner option. I previously had a 1 burner farberware that Ioved, but this 2 burner option had me interested. I ordered it and love it. I use it everyday and it works just like I need it to. The right burner is smaller and doesn't heat up as high, but still high enough to boil small to medium pot. I can use both burners and air fryer or toaster oven without tripping the breaker. I love it and would recommend it to anyone looking for an alternative to having a regular stove. very energy efficient.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The unit is very easy to clean, worked well - until about 4 months after purchase when the large burner quit working. It was used only a few times a week. No real reason for it to stop working. Spent over 1/2 hour on the phone waiting for Cuisinart customer service. Had to send the cord in (??) and pay $10 for them to ship me a new one. A royal pain in the a**. Considering other reviews having the same complaints- I'd recommend not purchasing this unit unless you need it only for a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: We bought this induction cooktop to help us get through a kitchen remodel. It boils water pretty quickly, I've made a stir fry, worked just fine. I've cooked potatoes on the big side and sauteed mushrooms on the small side at the same time without any problems. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cooking it up
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! It’s light weight and really easy to clean. Cools down fast. I wish the second burner had been the same temperature adjustments as the other but still love it
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Shults

customer_reviews.title: This is a sleek and great working cook top the larger burner gets hotter than ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a sleek and great working cook top the larger burner gets hotter than the smaller one it is low amp load we are using it in our RV so we use no Propane. We think it is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: George Stark

customer_reviews.title: 3 solid year
customer_reviews.text: Was a very good option for 3 years. Now, one side is gone so we're thinking get another one. Good service for the value, considering is our only range. But I think 3 years is a very little time if you think any common range can go up to 10/15 years
customer_reviews.author: Jose Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a new purchase, and we’ve only used it a few times. So far, very happy with the purchase. It boils water in no time, temperature is easy to control, which I didn’t expect, to be honest. Being more used to gas, I was surprised that the temperature is as easy to control as a gas stove. The portability will be great in the summer for outside cooking. It’s easy to clean also. Very happy with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: ANNE L

customer_reviews.title: A good piece of equipment to add to your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: It's a good piece of equipment, but you need to have 100% metal pot and pans before it gets hot and inducts. A very good piece of equipment, and have worked well so far, and very happy for the long warranty that was provided. The price was a little higher than I would have liked, but only time will tell if it will be worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: JWoohoo101

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and so very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and so very easy to clean, that is why I ordered this cooktop.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reid

customer_reviews.title: NOT Worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product in June and its already not working!!! Terrible!!!
customer_reviews.author: Didi🦋

customer_reviews.title: best portable stove ever
customer_reviews.text: Works so well. Looks so sheek. I have literally nothing to complain about. love it. It is my one and only stove that i have in my little studio apartment and it's all that's needed.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Clark

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I really enjoy it and it's very light ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I really enjoy it and it's very light and portable. I wish both burners were the larger size, but we can't have everything!
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Its portable.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new induction stove top. It does everything that it claims. Uses very little electric.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Induction Cooking is efficient fast and safe
customer_reviews.text: This induction cook-top cooks faster with less energy than any other cooking surface. Just make sure the pots and pans you use are magnetic steel and flat bottomed, then everything works perfect. the burners do not get hot- glass and aluminum cookware will not work. Buy one and use it correctly you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: pit

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Great temporary solution. Easy to operate and the cooking temperature is easy to navigate and moderate.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Convection pans only or special ceramic plate
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive unit, note one burner the smaller one designed only to go up to 5 setting. Be aware you need pots and pans that work on convection cooktop or special inexpensive plate pans sit on top of.
customer_reviews.author: garmor@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this cooktop. It Cooks well and is easy to use. We did have to adjust to the type of convection ready pans that you must have in order to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenette Samoray

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a fair price but the fan are too noisy.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to cook a bit slower but the positives out way any negatives, Cools quickly is attractive and user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Ooooooo

customer_reviews.title: Great stove top.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Writing this after nearly 2 years of use and it is still amazing. Easy to use and clean. Heat up very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmythehorse

customer_reviews.title: Great dual burner
customer_reviews.text: Great induction cooktop. Friend lives and is using in place of stovetop he can’t reach from his wheelchair. He said it provides great heat control and is tremendous
customer_reviews.author: J. Robards

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect and doesnt blow my fuses like similar products have.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Love Cuisinart! I have never had a bad cuisinart purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Bainey

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing but it does need special pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of it but be sure that your cookware is compatible with this induction burner, I learned that the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stove top highly recommended... Better then the conventional stores target Wal-Mart etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working day 1!
customer_reviews.text: One of the burners stopped working the first day before I even used it. I called Cuisanart and they said it would be 15 days before I could get another one. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Long

customer_reviews.title: Timers are for show only.
customer_reviews.text: The timers do nothing but beep. They do NOT shut off the burner. Very disappointing and misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: burned out after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: worked great until it quit after 4 months. I expected a lot more out of this brand
customer_reviews.author: patti

customer_reviews.title: not your mom's cooktop
customer_reviews.text: after a short time of adjustment and learning, this thing is a superstar
customer_reviews.author: john m brunson

customer_reviews.title: Good machine but not great
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't heat as quickly as other similar induction burners I have had but the temperature controls are more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Glick

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with product and price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as cooktop while our Samsung kitchen appliance model NE58H9970WS was being warranty repaired (took over a month to get parts for Samsung). The ICT handled everything very well (eggs, stews, spaghetti etc etc).
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: We use it every day.. sits on counter next to glass-top electric stove. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Reesespieces

customer_reviews.title: Not very efficient
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving 3 stars because it only recognize an specific type of metal, it wouldn’t turn on with most of my pots and pans, besides that it’s really good quality and it heats up really good.
customer_reviews.author: meylin sang

customer_reviews.title: Some of my pans don’t work on it but I use my cast iron on it and it’s great.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to cook faster than than what I was using. Some of my pans don’t work on it but I use my cast iron on it and it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: there are few crack in the middle after using for two months
customer_reviews.text: Good and convenient for using. but don't know why there are few crack in the middle after using for two months. maybe too hot on the top? It seems like can't not return this item, passed return time. and no warranty?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping - product was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Finer control/more settings would be nice. It works well as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: W. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Only ding is if you want to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Only ding is if you want to get a pot of water to boil, you need to give yourself some more time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gutkowski

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last lone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother, hasn't even been a year and the case has cracked and no longer works. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A.

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly right; price, design, size, quick cooking temperatures, & most importantly for me- I can use my vast array of cast iron Psew!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Faster than my gas stove!
customer_reviews.text: We took it camping & it was perfect!!!! Thank you! They even include a little magnet so you can make sure you are using the correct cookware.
customer_reviews.author: B. Walter

customer_reviews.title: uneven heat
customer_reviews.text: IT HEATS AT THE BACK OF THE BURNER. You have to put the pan over the back edge for the pan to heat in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES BAUER

customer_reviews.title: Great for a smaller space.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the small space I have. Up to heat quick.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Poole

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for price
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this purchase. Have it in my motor home so I don't cook with propane any longer. Buy good pans.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: High quality Cuisinart
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a tiny home kitchen. Cuisinart engineering at its best! This is a high quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Szoka

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, hopefully it doesn't stop working like other customers ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, hopefully it doesn't stop working like other customers have complained about, I have it for a month now and only use it too cook light meals 3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Danny C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! It's great when you're cooking for a crowd ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! It's great when you're cooking for a crowd or just for two. Having the extra burners make it so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: P. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The unit takes a long time to heat up. It's also very uneven, because of this floor whatever spills over gets into the cracks. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COOKTOP  NOT SATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: YOU CAN ONLY PUT A HEAVY WEIGHT POT ON THE SURFACE OTHERWISE IT SHUTS AUTOMATICALLY IT DID NOT SERVE MY PURPOSE AT ALL
customer_reviews.author: RACHEL

customer_reviews.title: Only Lasted One Year Using 3X a Week, Boils Water Slowly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 8/13/16 and it just died today... both burners. I thought it should have lasted longer for this price. Also, because the current is shared by both burners, you can't use just one burner at full wattage which is much slower when boiling water for pasta or soups, etc. I would not buy this again. I used it about 3 times a week during the year this I had it. I've had other one-burner induction cookers and they will boil water quickly. I'll be buying another one-burner (Secura) which I had before and replaced because it died at one year. At least that burner isn't that costly and uses all its wattage on the burner.
customer_reviews.author: RDCprc

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money X2
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one, the first was giving E error and the second just stop heating, I'm very disappointed with this product. Another issue is that it was make with a cheap plastic that start breaking with the time.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro J Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great cooktop
customer_reviews.text: We're temporarily using this as our only cooktop since our home flooded and we're rebuilding. It may only be 15 amp but it works great to cook for two adults and two kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for 6 months and works great. It looks really nice too. Get all the cooking I need done. Biggest pan that will work is like a 12 inch saucepan. Cant go heavy duty with this like if you're making a big stew or something but other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient cooktop. Works quickly like a gas stove!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for 2 years now and I love it. I got rid of an old oven/range and never replaced it. (I also have a Hamilton Beach table top mini oven/convection I rarely use) It heats quickly and when I adjust the heat while using, it simulates the speed of a gas stove adjustment. I also have to add I lost my hot water heater a month ago and haven’t replaced it. I heat a couple of very large stock pots of water to bathe with and my overall energy bill has still decreased. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy GH

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to go all electric.
customer_reviews.text: Natural gas is now the leading cause of increasing GHGs in the atmosphere, according to the network of scientists working on the Global Carbon Project (2019). Worse than oil or coal. Bought a stove top cover and put this on it. Works great for my wife and I (retired). Very seldom need to use the gas stove. Combined with an Instant Pot and an electric coffee maker it really reduces the need for natural gas and avoids serious nitrous oxide emissions in your house. My wife has bad asthma and it improved when we got this.
customer_reviews.author: Norcal User

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: We renovated a small bar area in our basement to a "full" kitchen. I love, love, love the induction cooktop and that I can tuck it away in a cabinet when not in use. It heats up instantly, leaves our copper-clad pans looking like new and is super easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: C. VanEpps

customer_reviews.title: the two burners will not both get really 'hot'...only so much wattage
customer_reviews.text: Furthermore, dropped a bottle of hotsauce, a 4 oz gourmet type on the thing and the top shattered. Now the whole thing is useless. Buy two of the single ones, a MUCH better use of your money, if one get broken or fails you are only out $50-60. Buy another... I seem to be disappointed with Cuisinart lately. A shame the products are just not what they used to be. Granted I did drop the hotsauce bottle on it, but hey, would it be so hard to make the glass replaceable at a reasonable cost and by the owner? Bad plan for an expensive item.
customer_reviews.author: norighttousemyname

customer_reviews.title: Good and Elegent Product
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the product. It can only support utensils that are magnetic. Easy to use, but takes a little to cook on this stove top. Overall happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Needs a certain pans to work with it
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my daughter, who lives in a studio apartment. It looks nice and is easy to store. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT ALTERNATIVE TO CHEAP ELECTRIC STOVE TOP
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what is supposed to do. Very flexible, etc. With timer which is nice. My lonely negative, hence the four stars is that the cooling fans are too loud which could be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: sailjack

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I have a problem with is that it doesn't display the temp
customer_reviews.author: harold

customer_reviews.title: Easy cooking and baking machine.
customer_reviews.text: It's different, but pretty easy to use. Makes great fries without the fats. Chicken done in 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Duddy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller burner is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cooktop as I missed my previous induction cooktop that was part of my oven. The smaller burner is limited to how hot it will get and is disappointing. Also, if you use larger pans that overlap the sides it will melt the plastic. The fan noise is moderate.
customer_reviews.author: Arctic Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Boils water fast!
customer_reviews.text: Plug and play. Make certain your cookware is conduction ready, very important.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R. Hensley, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a little noise when you plug it in.  It's OK.
customer_reviews.text: My gas is being converted to electric, and I need a cooktop. This fits the bill. It is a good size, and variable temperatures act closely to gas.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.S.

customer_reviews.title: I love the sleekness and that it doesn't weigh a ton
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use this cooktop yet because it's going in my new tiny house which is under construction. With limited space for my kitchen, this unit will be tucked away when not in use. I love the sleekness and that it doesn't weigh a ton. Thank you, Cuisinart!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Azevedo

customer_reviews.title: timer function
customer_reviews.text: the unit has a timer function for each burner, however, the timer does nothing but beep when time runs out. I have another single unit that turns off the unit when time expires. That is what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN HOHMAN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product exactly what you would expect reduce your cooking space especially in a small condo with no stove
customer_reviews.author: Kahuna

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooktop after we had solar installed to use instead of buying more propane. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Works well but plastic doesn't holdup
customer_reviews.text: Had less than year, has a crack down the center of the plastic separating the two burners
customer_reviews.author: Dog mom

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this for about 6 months and love it. The only drawback was some of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about 6 months and love it. The only drawback was some of my smaller pans would not work on the small burner. In order to rectify this I purchased a regular little 2 burner hotplate. Boy did I notice the difference!! The Cuisiinart Induction is instant! No long waits for heat up. (Comparing to my hotplate). I was really surprised. Hoping Cuisinart comes out with a small enough cook top for my tiny (5/6") pans!
customer_reviews.author: purplepalace

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: need to be able to use any pot or pan not everyone has stainless steel pots and pans but does work realy nice.i will keep it as my back up plan lol
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Zurn

customer_reviews.title: and it works nicely. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Have used this cooktop for a few months now,and it works nicely. Very satisfied. Especially like the portability, and ease of cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Reaves

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't used induction for cooking you are missing out.
customer_reviews.author: gerhardt

customer_reviews.title: Lying by omission
customer_reviews.text: Lying by omission. The Amazon or site advertising is only for warming.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: We're Satisfied...
customer_reviews.text: Oh Yeah. Got this for the RV and it's great...Compared it to the induction cook top in the house kitchen...spot on. Just wish the right hand burner was as large as the left and had the same temps. Right burner is really only for warming. BUT...we like it and see a lot of use while traveling...bring on the groceries...... Can see it working GREAT in a dorm roo... Dennis
customer_reviews.author: Always a Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Induction cooking is sooooo good!! This is a timesaver and very easy cleanup!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! I can't figure out why I didn't get one of these decades ago! Very economical, too!
customer_reviews.author: life is wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Loud and hard to keep clean.
customer_reviews.text: It’s like a smartphone but much harder to keep looking clean. Nice out of the box but it’s a mess thereafter. And it’s loud.
customer_reviews.author: Screw Putin & His Puppet Donny

product_meta.title: Cuisinart ICT-60 Double Induction Cooktop, One Size, Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:Cuisinart Induction CooktopThe Double Induction Cooktop offers the ultimate in cooking flexibility, adding two induction burners to any kitchen, or any place without a kitchen! Induction technology offers an exceptional cooking experience, with instant heat-up and consistent, precise heat throughout cooking. Each burner has its own heat setting control, 150-minute timer and On/Off switch. The smooth glass surface looks sleek and wipes clean. It's ideal for entertaining and holidays when cooking for a crowd. And its compact and portable size makes it ideal for small spaces without a kitchen, such as dorm rooms, boats, patios or RVs. This is a versatile and powerful tool that's a great addition to any kitchen - big or small! Refer instruction manual before use. Features: Induction technology for fastest heat-up|Uses up to 70% less energy than conventional cooktops|Bright LED displays|Left burner: on/off 8 heat settings 150-minute timer|Right burner: on/off 5 heat settings 150-minute timer|Heat shuts off automatically 30 seconds after pan is lifted off|Safe exhaust-free and flame-free cooking|Even heating – no hot spots|Must use with induction-ready cookware*|Limited Five Year Motor Warranty *Cast Iron 18/0 stainless steel
feature_bullets: Induction technology for fast heat-up and consistent heat throughout cooking. Must use with induction-ready cookware
Dual heat settings: 8 settings on the left burner, 5 settings on the right burner. Dimensions: LWH: 14.25" x 23.5" x 2.5"
Individual 150-minute timers and ON/OFF switches for each burner
Throws off less heat so kitchens stay cooler.MC Cubic Feet: 3.29
Heat turns off 30 seconds after pot or pan is removed.UC Cubic Feet: 1.38

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars227 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
